    • Method Detail

      • addExternalProfiles

        public Response addExternalProfiles(java.lang.String serviceId,
                                    CisExternalPaymentRequest profile)
        Create a new payment profile (ex : stored credit card).
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the service id
        profile - The input of the request is an external payment request containing the result map of an external authorization, such as the CyberSource Silent Order Post.
        Returns:
        paymentProfileResult if the profile was successfully created. Otherwise, an error code and error message is returned.
